item.title: How to be a Server Administrator
item.description: Create a new user sudo adduser {username} Change user password Change from root sudo passwd {username} User change their password passwd Get user information id {userName} Delete user sudo userdel {userName} Create a folder for the user # create a foler by root sudo mkdir {folder_path} # change folder owner and group (-R: recursive) sudo chown -R {userName}:{group} {folder_path} # list details to check ls -la Add an existing user to sudo sudo adduser {userName} sudo Unban IP address (Use fail2ban package) Check banned ip address sudo fail2ban-client get sshd banip Unban specific blocked IP address sudo fail2ban-client set sshd unbanip {ip_addr} Unban all blocked IP address sudo fail2ban-client set sshd unbanip --all
